@title OracleSlippage interface
 @notice Enables slippage checks against oracle prices

against"}},"checkOracleSlippage(bytes[],uint128[],uint24,uint32)":{"params":{"amounts":"The weights for each entry in `paths`","maximumTickDivergence":"The maximum number of ticks that the price can
